sentence.Network_en: They knew only too well that any passer - by , any lounger, might be a spy.
sentence.Network_cn: 她们非常清楚任何一个 过路人 或游手好闲者都可能告密.

sentence.Network_en: This is where I thought the barca lounger could go!
sentence.Network_cn: 这是我为你的懒汉躺椅安排的地方!

sentence.Network_en: She eased herself out of the lounger and plopped down by the edge of the swimming - pool.
sentence.Network_cn: 她从躺椅上起身,从池边扑通一声跳入泳池.
